content: Hello, I've been looking at the HAPI FHIR project and am very happy with what I'm seeing so far. I do have one question though. Is it possible to use the HAPI FHIR models and rest API (ingestion and search) but have a custom storage layer? e.g. there is some interface I can implement and then tell the rest API to use that class instead? Thanks!
absolutely. Lots of people are using HAPI in that way...
Can you point me to some docs that show how to do that? Or perhaps which interface that is? I am not finding it easy to find any of this on the docs website.
